edu.smu.tspell.wordnet
Interface AdjectiveSatelliteSynset

All Superinterfaces:
AdjectiveSynset, Synset
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdjectiveSatelliteReferenceSynset
public interface AdjectiveSatelliteSynset
extends AdjectiveSynset

Represents an adjective satellite synset, that is one that is part of a cluster of similar adjects that are all associated with a single "head" synset.

See Also:
Five Papers on WordNet ("Design and Implementation of the WordNet Lexical Database and Searching Software")
